item.title: BlackBerry Picking On Cyber Monday
item.description:
Similar to how Black Friday has become a tradition for in-person shopping, Cyber Monday is now the time for finding exceptional online deals. With that in mind, let’s explore a standout product line this year: BlackBerry devices from Research in Motion. Business users have long favored BlackBerry for mobile communication. RIM has prioritized supporting corporate IT with the performance and security needed for serious business use on the go. But how affordable are these popular BlackBerry models?..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/blackberry-picking-on-cyber-monday/

item.title: Get Your BlackBerry 8830 Before President Obama
item.description:
President Obama famously missed his BlackBerry 8830 after prioritizing security during his initial days in office. Now, there’s news that he might be reunited with his BlackBerry, equipped with specialized software for secure communication. You, however, can enjoy the RIM BlackBerry 8830 World Edition right away, even without the special government features. This standard model caters to both personal and business needs. The BlackBerry 8830 World Edition eliminates the need for separate phones for domestic and international use...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/get-your-blackberry-8830-before-president-obama/
